categories.name: Love
quotes: Your smile is my favorite notification.
Love is not what you say, it's what you prove.
In a sea of people, my eyes will always search for you.
You are the reason I look down at my phone and smile.
I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, then all at once.
Every love story is beautiful, but ours is my favorite.
You don't cross my mind – you live in it.
I choose you. And I'll choose you over and over without pause, without doubt.
My heart is, and always will be, yours.
Love isn't finding a perfect person. It's seeing an imperfect person perfectly.
Together is a wonderful place to be.
You are the best thing I never planned.
If I had a flower for every time you made me smile, I'd have an endless garden.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
I want all of you, forever, every day.
Love is friendship set on fire.
premium_quotes: You are my today and all of my tomorrows.
I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
I have found the one whom my soul loves.
Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.

categories.name: Sad
quotes: The saddest thing about love is that not only that it cannot last forever, but that heartbreak is soon forgotten.
Sometimes you have to smile to hide your tears.
It's sad when someone you know becomes someone you knew.
The worst feeling is pretending you don't care about something when it's all you think about.
Behind my smile is everything you'll never understand.
Sometimes the person who tries to keep everyone happy is the most lonely.
I'm not okay, but I smile anyway.
Tears are words the heart can't express.
You can't protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by letting a little water out.
Every heart has a pain. Only the way of expressing it is different.
It hurts when you have someone in your heart but can't have them in your arms.
The worst kind of pain is when you're smiling to stop the tears from falling.
Sometimes it takes sadness to know happiness.
premium_quotes: Grief is the price we pay for love.
The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keep out the joy.
Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of a pure heart.
Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not.
Sadness is but a wall between two gardens.

categories.name: Attitude
quotes: I'm not special. I'm a limited edition.
My attitude is based on how you treat me.
I don't have an attitude problem. You have a perception problem.
Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
I'm not here to fit in. I'm here to stand out.
Silence is the best response to a fool.
Don't mistake my kindness for weakness.
I'm not heartless. I just learned how to use my heart less.
Know your worth. Then add tax.
I'd rather be hated for who I am than loved for who I'm not.
My life, my rules, my attitude.
Too glam to give a damn.
I'm a vibe that no one else can replace.
Stars can't shine without darkness.
If you can't handle me at my worst, you don't deserve me at my best.
Judge me when you are perfect.
premium_quotes: I am the storm. Not the one who waits for it to pass.
They told me I couldn't. That's why I did.
A diamond doesn't know its value, but it doesn't lose it either.
My attitude is a result of your actions. Change your actions and I'll change my attitude.
Born to express, not to impress.

categories.name: Motivation
quotes: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
Dream big. Start small. Act now.
The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
Little things make big days.
It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Great things never come from comfort zones.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
premium_quotes: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become.

categories.name: Funny
quotes: I'm not lazy, I'm on energy-saving mode.
My bed is a magical place where I suddenly remember everything I was supposed to do.
I don't need a hair stylist, my pillow gives me a new hairstyle every morning.
Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
I'm not arguing, I'm simply explaining why I'm right.
Common sense is like deodorant. The people who need it most never use it.
My wallet is like an onion. Opening it makes me cry.
I need a six-month holiday, twice a year.
I'm on a seafood diet. I see food and I eat it.
Of course I talk to myself. Sometimes I need expert advice.
I don't need anger management. You need to stop making me angry.
WiFi went down for five minutes, so I had to talk to my family.
Friday is my second favorite F word. Food is my first.
I'm not weird, I'm a limited edition.
An apple a day keeps anyone away if you throw it hard enough.
premium_quotes: I finally realized that people are prisoners of their phones... that's why it's called a cell phone.
If overthinking was an Olympic sport, I'd win gold.
Brains are awesome. I wish everybody had one.
I'm not shy, I'm holding back my awesomeness so I don't intimidate you.
My favorite exercise is a cross between a lunge and a crunch... I call it lunch.

categories.name: Good Morning
quotes: Good morning! Every day is a fresh start. Make it count!
Rise up, start fresh, see the bright opportunity in each new day.
Today is a good day to have a great day.
Good morning sunshine! You light up my world.
The morning was full of sunlight and hope.
Wake up and chase your dreams. Good morning!
Each morning brings new potential, but if you dwell on the past, you won't see it.
A new day is like a blank page. Write a good one!
Good morning! Life is too short to wake up with regrets.
The sun is up, the sky is blue. Today is beautiful, and so are you!
May your coffee be hot and your Monday be short. Good morning!
Good morning! Believe something wonderful is about to happen.
Start each day with a grateful heart. Good morning!
The biggest source of motivation are your own thoughts. Think big and motivate yourself to win.
Every morning is a chance to begin again. Good morning!
premium_quotes: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts. Good morning!
Let your smile change the world, but don't let the world change your smile.
Today will be amazing. So wake up and smile!
Good morning! The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
Morning is wonderful. Its only drawback is that it comes at such an inconvenient time of day.

categories.name: Birthday
quotes: Wishing you a day filled with love and happiness. Happy Birthday!
May your birthday be as wonderful as the smile you put on others' faces.
Another year older, another year wiser. Happy Birthday!
Here's to another year of laughing at our own jokes. Happy Birthday!
Count your life by smiles, not tears. Happy Birthday!
Wishing you health, wealth, and endless blessings. Happy Birthday!
May all your dreams come true this birthday and always.
You deserve the world. Happy Birthday, superstar!
Growing old is mandatory. Growing up is optional. Happy Birthday!
The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
Age is merely the number of years the world has been enjoying you. Happy Birthday!
Today is the oldest you've ever been and the youngest you'll ever be again!
May your birthday be the start of a year filled with good luck and great memories.
Life is a journey, and your birthday is a beautiful milestone. Enjoy every moment!
A birthday is nature's way of telling us to eat more cake!
premium_quotes: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. Happy Birthday!
May the years continue to be good to you. Happy Birthday!
Every birthday is a gift. Every day is a gift. Unwrap them both with gratitude!
Today a star was born, and the world became a better place. Happy Birthday!
May your birthday and every day be filled with the warmth of sunshine and the happiness of smiles.

categories.name: Festival Wishes
quotes: May the spirit of the festival fill your heart with joy and happiness!
Wishing you and your family a blessed and joyous celebration!
May this festival bring light, love, and laughter into your life.
Let's celebrate the beauty of togetherness. Happy Festivities!
May the divine blessings of the festival fill your life with happiness.
Sending you warm wishes wrapped with love. Happy Celebrations!
May the colors of the festival add cheer and happiness in your life.
Here's wishing you joy, peace, and prosperity during this festive season!
Celebrate the moments that make life truly beautiful. Happy Festival!
May the festival season bring you closer to the things that matter most.
Festivals remind us to be grateful for all the blessings we have.
May every festival bring new hope, new joy, and new beginnings!
Light a lamp of love, blast a chain of sorrow. Shoot a rocket of prosperity. Happy Festival!
May the good times and treasures of the present become golden memories of tomorrow.
Let the festival vibes take over. Celebrate, enjoy, and be merry!
premium_quotes: May the blessings of the Almighty fill your life with happiness and prosperity.
Festivals are a time to reflect, rejoice, and renew. Wishing you the best!
Let the celebrations remind you of all the beautiful things in your life.
May every candle you light, every prayer you make, bring miracles in your life.
This festive season, may you be blessed with everything your heart desires.

categories.name: Tamil Love
quotes: உன் கண்களில் நான் என்னை தொலைத்தேன்.
காதல் என்பது இரு இதயங்களின் மௌன மொழி.
உன் நினைவுகள் என் நெஞ்சின் இதமான வலி.
நீ இல்லாத நாள் என்பது நாளே அல்ல.
என் உலகம் உன்னில் தொடங்கி உன்னில் முடிகிறது.
ஒரு பார்வையில் ஆயிரம் வார்த்தைகள் சொன்னாய்.
காதல் வயதை பார்ப்பதில்லை, கவலையை அறிவதில்லை.
உன் சிரிப்பு என் வாழ்க்கையின் அர்த்தம்.
இதயம் துடிக்கும் ஒவ்வொரு முறையும் உன் பெயர் சொல்கிறது.
நீ என் கனவுகளின் ராணி.
உன்னோடு நடக்கும் ஒவ்வொரு நொடியும் சொர்க்கம்.
காதல் என்றால் என்ன என்று நீ தான் எனக்கு சொல்லி தந்தாய்.
உன் பேச்சு என் காதுக்கு இசை.
நீ என் வாழ்வின் மிக அழகான அத்தியாயம்.
உன் கண்களில் எனக்கான உலகம் இருக்கிறது.
premium_quotes: காதல் என்பது ஒரு பயணம், ஒரு இலக்கு அல்ல.
உன்னை நேசிப்பது என் விதி, உன்னோடு வாழ்வது என் கனவு.
நீ இன்றி என் உயிர் ஒரு வெற்றுப் பக்கம்.
காதலின் ஒரு சொட்டு ஆயிரம் கண்ணீரை துடைக்கும்.
என் இதயத்தின் ஒவ்வொரு துடிப்பும் உனக்காகவே.

categories.name: Tamil Motivation
quotes: தோல்வி என்பது வெற்றியின் முதல் படி.
கனவு காணுங்கள், அதை நனவாக்குங்கள்.
உங்கள் கடின உழைப்பு ஒரு நாள் கண்டிப்பாக பலன் தரும்.
போராடு, வெற்றி உனக்காகவே காத்திருக்கிறது.
வீழ்வது தவறல்ல, எழாமல் இருப்பதே தவறு.
நம்பிக்கை இழக்காதே, வெற்றி நெருங்கி வருகிறது.
உனக்கு நீயே போதும், உனக்கு நீயே முதல்.
ஒவ்வொரு சிறிய முயற்சியும் பெரிய வெற்றிக்கான அடித்தளம்.
வாழ்க்கை என்பது ஒரு சவால், அதை ஏற்றுக்கொள்.
கஷ்டம் வரும் போது தான் கற்கள் வைரமாகும்.
எதிர்காலம் உங்கள் கையில் இருக்கிறது.
விடாமுயற்சி வெற்றிக்கு வழிவகுக்கும்.
உங்கள் கனவுகளை யாரும் திருட முடியாது.
இன்றைய வலி நாளைய வெற்றி.
சாதிக்க வேண்டும் என்ற உறுதி இருந்தால், உலகமே உங்கள் காலடியில்.
premium_quotes: காலம் கடந்தாலும் முயற்சி கைவிடாதே.
வெற்றி பெற விரும்புவோர் தோல்வியை ஏற்றுக்கொள்ள கற்றுக்கொள்ள வேண்டும்.
உங்கள் சிந்தனை உங்கள் வாழ்க்கையை தீர்மானிக்கிறது.
ஒரு நல்ல எண்ணம் ஆயிரம் வெற்றிகளுக்கு சமம்.
பயணம் கடினமாக இருக்கலாம், ஆனால் இலக்கு அழகானது.
